text: Michael C. Stenger (1950/1951 - June 27, 2022) was an American law enforcement officer. He was the 41st Sergeant at Arms of the United States Senate from April 16, 2018, to January 7, 2021. He resigned after a mob of Donald Trump supporters attacked the United States Capitol. Before, he was a United States Secret Service agent. Stenger died on June 27, 2022 at the age of 71. ==References== Category:2022 deaths Category:American police officers Category:1950s births
title: Michael C. Stenger
